price: 31. y cuando regresaban a sus familias, lo hacían satisfechos (de su actitud).
arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā inqalabū ilā ahlihimu inqalabū fakihīna
